data.eml:eml: Telmaeshna paradoxica gen. et sp. nov., a new fossil dragonfly (Insecta: Odonata: Anisoptera) from the Yixian Formation, Liaoning, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Binglan, Ren, Dong, Pang, Hong (2008): Telmaeshna paradoxica gen. et sp. nov., a new fossil dragonfly (Insecta: Odonata: Anisoptera) from the Yixian Formation, Liaoning, China. Zootaxa 1681: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180415
